courseDetails.title: Read Construction & Structural Drawings Like An Expert
courseDetails.shortDescription: Full Course on Structural Drawings From Basic to Advance
targetAudiences: The proposedTotal Project Area of the Project is 5.75 Acre. Project comprises of two low rise structures and two high rise towers with the one basement levels as detailed below-  • G+32 storey tower =1 No. • G+22 storey tower = 1 No. • G+4 storey Administrative Block = 1 No. • G+1 Convention Block = 1 No. • Basement = 1 level  Total Ground Coverage is 6834 sqm and Total Built-up area of all floors are 88000 Sqm. Building is designed on the basis of Green Building Concept and also to achieve a LEEDS platinum rating. Structure has been designed as a RCC framed structure and type of foundation is Raft Foundation. Parking facility is provided in a basement and at stilt level. Offices of the various department are housed in two high-rise towers. The Administration & Auditorium blocks are located at the front in low-rise structures.
